name: @kronodeus/nwz
description: Browse the top stories on Hacker News from your terminal.

scripts.nuke: git clean -dxf && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.ci: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run lint && pnpm run build && pnpm run test
scripts.release:patch: pnpm run ci && pnpm version patch && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run ci && pnpm version minor && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: pnpm run ci && pnpm version major && git push origin main --follow-tags
